copy.desc29001: Plenty of room for you and an Animal Friend!
copy.desc29002: This small bloom room is filled with the colors and fragrances of spring!
copy.desc29003: Light and bright, this single-room home is the essence of summer charm!
copy.desc29004: Bask in the cool comfort of a clear running stream -- in your own home!
copy.desc29005: Sturdy, efficient, comfy and cozy all in one!
copy.desc29021: A cozy, ground-level den with a treetop roost that's really for the birds!
copy.desc29022: From floor to curly-stem ceiling, this home is a celebration of all things that grow!
copy.desc29023: Special tall-growing sunflowers offer plenty of room to live and play!
copy.desc29024: So fresh and fragrant you'll think you're on the banks of Soapstone Stream!
copy.desc29025: A practical design filled with creative extras like cross-twig windows and a skyview roof!
copy.desc29042: This garden is a celebration of all things that grow!
copy.desc29043: Special tall-growing sunflowers offer plenty of room to play!
copy.desc29044: So fresh and fragrant you'll think you're on the banks of Soapstone Stream!
